meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Special Recognition
agenda_items.description: Special Recognition of former Park Board member Taylor Toynes for his service to the Park and Recreation Board

agenda_items.title: White Rock Lake
agenda_items.description: Authorize an alcohol permit to Jennifer Hoesterey, to serve alcohol at the Celebration White Rock event to be held at White Rock Lake, located at 8300 Garland Road.

agenda_items.title: Dorothy & Wallace Savage Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize issuing an alcohol permit to Peter Loh, to serve alcohol at the Swiss Avenue Mother’s Day Home Tour event to be held at Dorothy and Wallace Savage.

agenda_items.title: Lakewood Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract with Metropolitan Infrastructure, PLLC for engineering design services.

agenda_items.title: Land Acquisition
agenda_items.description: Authorize acquisition from John F. Skelton, III, of approximately 9,618 square feet of improved land for inclusion into the Preston Ridge Trail linear park.

agenda_items.title: Hattie R. Moore Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize adoption of the Hattie R. Moore Park Master Plan.

agenda_items.title: Fair Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize Change Order No. 2 for an increase in the construction services contract for the construction of Fair Park Tower Building Rehabilitation.

agenda_items.title: Fair Park Grant Application
agenda_items.description: Authorize an application for the Texas Parks and Wildlife Department Outdoor Recreation Legacy Partnership Grant program.

agenda_items.title: Director’s Performance Review
agenda_items.description: Closed Session to discuss the evaluation and duties of the Director of the Park and Recreation Department.

agenda_items.title: Director’s Performance Review
agenda_items.description: Authorize adoption of the 2021/22 performance appraisal and any salary consideration for the Park and Recreation Director.

agenda_items.title: Other/Non-Action Items
agenda_items.description: Staff Announcements – Upcoming Park and Recreation Department Events.

agenda_items.title: Next Park Board meeting
agenda_items.description: Next Park Board meeting at 10:00 am Thursday, March 21, 2024.

financial_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional services contract for engineering design services.
Authorize acquisition from John F. Skelton, III, of approximately 9,618 square feet of improved land.
Authorize Change Order No. 2 for an increase in the construction services contract for Fair Park Tower Building Rehabilitation.
Authorize an application for the Texas Parks and Wildlife Department Outdoor Recreation Legacy Partnership Grant program.
